LocalMapMessageRequest Class Reference

A Request that makes a message over a local aream that optinally can be sent as an email. More...

Detailed Description

A Request that makes a message over a local aream that optinally can be sent as an email.

LocalMapMessageRequest::LocalMapMessageRequest (  const RequestData &  data,
int32  northLat,
int32  westLon,
int32  southLat,
int32  eastLon,
StringTable::languageCode  lang,
uint16  localMapWidth,
uint16  localMapHeight,
const char *  localMapString,
const TopRegionRequest *  topReq,
const ClientSetting *  clientSetting,
GfxFeatureMap *  markItems = NULL,
bool  makeImages = true,
bool  makeLink = false,
bool  realMapURLs = true,
RouteMessageRequestType::MessageContent  contentType = RouteMessageRequestType::HTML_CONTENT,
uint32  maxMessageSize = MAX_UINT32,
bool  sendEmail = false,
const char *  toMailAddr = NULL,
const char *  fromMailAddr = NULL,
const char *  subject = NULL,
const char *  signature = NULL,
ImageDrawConfig::imageFormat  defaultFormat = ImageDrawConfig::PNG,
const MC2String &  copyright = "",
const UserItem *  user = NULL,
bool  contentLocation = false,
MapSettingsTypes::defaultMapSetting  mapSetting = MapSettingsTypes::MAP_SETTING_STD,
struct MapSettingsTypes::ImageSettings *  imageSettings = NULL,
const char *  messageFmt = NULL,
const char *  messageStartTextFmt = NULL,
const char *  messageEndTextFmt = NULL,
uint32  nbrMessageResources = MAX_UINT32,
char **  messageResourcesURI = NULL,
uint32 *  messageResourcesBuffLength = NULL,
byte **  messageResourcesBuff = NULL
) 
 

Create a LocalMapMessageRequest.

Parameters:
reqID unique request ID.
northLat The northern latitude of the local map.
westLon The western longitude of the local map.
southLat The southern latitude of the local map.
eastLon The eastern longitude of the local map.
lang The desired language of the message.
localMapWidth The width of the local map image.
localMapHeight The height of the local map image.
localMapString String describing the contents of the local Map.
topReq Pointer to valid TopRegionRequest with data
clientSetting The client settings to use for the map, or NULL.
markItems A GfxFeatureMap with GfxFeatureSymbols to add to the map.
makeImages If the message should contain the images refered to in the message.
makeLink If a link to a webpage containing the html version of the message.
realMapURLS If map image urls should be real ones that can be sent to a [XML|HTTP]Server.
contentType The type of message wanted.
maxMessageSize NB Not yet supported! The maximum size of a message, default MAX_UINT32.
sendEmail If the message should be sent as an email.
toMailAdr The receipitent of the email, used if sendEmail.
fromMailAdr The sender of the email, used if sendEmail.
subject The subject of the email, used if sendEmail.
signature The signuture, text last, of the email.
defaultFormat The default format of the images. Default PNG.
user The user doing the request, default NULL.
contentLocation If to add Content-Location or Content-ID, default Content-ID.
mapSetting The defaultMapSetting to use. Default STD.
imageSettings The ImageSettings to use, default NULL.
messageFmt Formart string where: "%LOCAL_MAP%", "%LOCAL_MAP_URI%", "%LOCAL_MAP_WIDTH%", "%LOCAL_MAP_HEIGHT%", "%LOCAL_MAP_ALT%", "%LOCAL_MAP_NAME%", "%SIGNATURE%" are replaced by actual strings (use without citations).
nbrMessageResources The number of resources that are static in the message.
messageResourcesURI The URI of the messageresources.
messageResourcesBuffLength The length of the resources in messageResourcesBuff.
messageResourcesBuff The raw bytes the the messageResources.

virtual LocalMapMessageRequest::~LocalMapMessageRequest (   )  [virtual]
 

Destructor deletes all resources.

Member Function Documentation

virtual PacketContainer* LocalMapMessageRequest::getAnswer (   )  [virtual]
 

Returns:
The answer if sendEmail then the answer is the SendEmailReplyPacket.

Reimplemented from Request.

char *&  messageEndTextFmt,
uint32 &  nbrMessageResources,
char **&  messageResourcesURI,
uint32 *&  messageResourcesBuffLength,
byte **&  messageResourcesBuff
)  [private]
 

Gets the default message.

Parameters:
messageFmt Set to new string with the default format.
nbrMessageResources Set to the number of messageResources.
messageResourcesBuffLength Set to new vector with the lengths of messageResourcesBuff.
messageResourcesBuff Set to new vector with new buffers with the messageResources.

Makes the message and sets up all the image requests.

Parameters:
northLat The northern latitude of the local map.
westLon The western longitude of the local map.
southLat The southern latitude of the local map.
eastLon The eastern longitude of the local map.
lang The desired language of the message.
localMapWidth The width of the local map image.
localMapHeight The height of the local map image.
localMapString String describing the contents of the local Map.
markItems A GfxFeatureMap with GfxFeatureSymbols to add to the map.
makeImages If the message should contain the images refered to in the message.
makeLink If a link to a webpage containing the html version of the message.
realMapURLS If map image urls should be real ones that can be sent to a [XML|HTTP]Server.
contentType The type of message wanted.
maxMessageSize NB Not yet supported! The maximum size of a message.
signature The signuture, text last, of the email.
defaultFormat The default format of the images.
mapSetting The defaultMapSetting to use.
imageSettings The ImageSettings to use.
messageFmt Formart string for the message.
nbrMessageResources The number of resources that are static in the message.
messageResourcesURI The URI of the messageresources.
messageResourcesBuffLength The length of the resources in messageResourcesBuff.
messageResourcesBuff The raw bytes the the messageResources.
topReq Pointer to valid TopRegionRequest with data
